external_references.description: Huss, D. (2016, March 1). Operation Transparent Tribe. Retrieved June 8, 2016.
Malhotra, A. et al. (2021, May 13). Transparent Tribe APT expands its Windows malware arsenal. Retrieved September 2, 2021.

description: [Transparent Tribe](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0134) has registered domains to mimic file sharing, government, defense, and research websites for use in targeted campaigns.(Citation: Proofpoint Operation Transparent Tribe March 2016)(Citation: Talos Transparent Tribe May 2021)
